mapper.select:
select
from ptn_service_point where service_point_type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT} and service_point_status = 0 order by create_time desc
mapper.update: update ptn_service_point set service_point_status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ptn_service_point
self_pick_bill_count = self_pick_bill_count + #{selfPickCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receive_bill_count = receive_bill_count + #{receiveCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = now()
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
